title: resourceAuthControlLevel
describes: Authorizataion Control Level for resouces associated with a given resource-group. ENUM: [individual, group]. Individual authorization control level indicates that access control is available per resource, i.e., authorization can be granted/not-granted on a per resource basis for the resources. Group authorization control level indicates that the authorization is available on group level only, i.e., authorization will be granted/not-granted for all the resources associated with the given resource group.
